name: Adventure of Cockadoodledoo
description: Greetings, [you]! As the player it is your job to guide the cosmic warrior, Cockadoodledoo. Make it all through all the courses using the power of "triple jump", "whip", and "transformation".  Waiting at the end is that dastardly bastard, the dreaded Evil Eye, the embodiment of darkness itself. Surely a challenge, however, a hero takes the rough path!
